extendedInfo.description: CardMobili the award winning Digital and Mobile Wallet cloud service.âWinner of the Vodafone Mobile Clicks Award in 2010ââWinner of the Audience Award of the Mobile Premier Awards 2011âCardMobili is The Digital and Mobile Wallet That Makes Your Life Easier!Download CardMobili and make your wallet lighter! ItÂ´s free, simple and a convenient way to replace your physical cards so you can stop carrying all that plastic. Never forget or misplace your cards again. Access all your favorite brands loyalty cards, rewards and membership information any place, any time, always with you!100% FREECreate your online account (using your Android or on the web at www.cardmobili.com) and securely store all your information online so you will never lose cards again. Enjoy a service with thousands of loyalty and membership cards from all over the world! It is completely and totally FREE! You can even receive coupons and special perks from CardMobili partners.Main advantages: Make your life easier with CardMobili; you will never have to carry all your plastic cards anymore.â¢ Have all your rewards and membership cards always with you on your Android;â¢ Scan your cards barcodes with your mobile phone to create your digital cards in seconds and replace all your plastic cards with CardMobili! â¢ Add your favorite brands loyalty cards and find stores near your location;â¢ At the store, identify yourself by the client number or the barcode visible on the screen.â¢ Discover current deals and opportunities with new mobile couponsâ¢ Save coupons in your CardMobili wallet to access and use later;â¢ Never worry about losing or changing your phone â all data is safely stored at our cloud service â download app again, login and you get all your cards and coupons back into your phone!Key Features:â¢ 100% free service with no advertisingâ¢ Safely store all your card data on the web, keep all your data in the cloud, it will be available from anywhere in the world. Restore your data if you change mobile phone.â¢ Enjoy over 2500  cards from all around the world;â¢ Search cards by country and categories, including, hotels, airline companies, supermarkets, fashion stores, insurances, technology, services and organizations;â¢ Save and manage your family cards in your account, and use them anytime you need;â¢ You can even create your own cards and customize them with an image of your preference (feature available at http://cardmobili.com).â¢ Access exclusive offers from our partners;CardMobili uses software (Zxing) to read barcodes and (Dateslider) as a date picker widget. Zxing and Dateslider are open source projects Licensed under the Apache License (Version 2.0) and can be found at http://code.google.com/p/zxing and http://code.google.com/p/android-datesliderWe would love to hear from you:Join us on http://facebook.com/cardmobiliFollow us on  http://twitter.com/cardmobiliVisit us: http://cardmobili.com

reviews.title: Complete and utter BS!!!!!
reviews.comment: If you want to be able to REALLY categorize any cards you \"add\" to your account because they don\'t already exist in the database for your region(country) don\'t bother with this app. It only allows addition to its \"Loyalty\" category on your account.

reviews.title: Brilliant but slight flaw

reviews.title: \303\263tima ideia com problema grave
reviews.comment: Os c\303\263digos de barras n\303\243o s\303\243o lidos pelos leitores de mesa (Continente) nem pelos leitores manuais (Sephora), obrigando os funcion\303\241rios a lerem e a introduzirem os n\303\272meros manualmente.  Foi exatamente para evitar esta situa\303\247\303\243o que se usam os c\303\263digos de barras. Se o c\303\263digo n\303\243o \303\251 lido no visor dos telefones ent\303\243o esta \303\263tima ideia n\303\243o serve para nada.  Testado com um SonyEricsson W715 e um smarthphone touchscreen capacitivo SonyEricsson Xperia Neo V.  Espero que consigam resolver o problema. Cumprimentos e boa sorte
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s not the worst
reviews.comment: I have one phone and you\'d think loading all your cards would provide instant availability, but it doesn\'t Cards are cloud stored and must be accessed by data connection EVERY TIME YOU USE THEM. CONS: No local copy is stored on your device. In poor services areas (small towns, rural areas), it has taken me up to 5 minutes to load just the barcode. In great services areas (big cities), it\'s nearly a non-issue. PROS: Lots of loyalty card programs included, so you\'ll probably find most every one you need; it\'s free B-); No heavy advertising. I would suggest to the developers to place an option in the app settings to allow local device caching of the cards and barcodes - people can usually add a larger MicroSD if memory is an issue. Then this app would be worth 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea

reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice app but unfortunately it will not cache barcodes locally: a cloud connection is required to display them, even though the numbers are available locally.  Unfortunately, the checkouts at my local ShopRite only get one bar of service and no data, so this app is useless for me.  Storing in the cloud is nice, but a way to operate off of local cache is a necessity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Much better!
